comments.body:
I think you can use something like:
```suggestion
    - export KAGGLE_USERNAME=datadinosaur  # [unix]
    - export KAGGLE_KEY=xxxxxxxxxxxxxx  # [unix]
    - set KAGGLE_USERNAME=datadinosaur  # [win]
    - set KAGGLE_KEY=xxxxxxxxxxxxxx  # [win]
    - kaggle --help
```
(I might be misremembering how to set variables on Windows)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@    - set KAGGLE_USERNAME=datadinosaur  # [win]
    - set KAGGLE_KEY=xxxxxxxxxxxxxx  # [win]
    - kaggle --help
